product_name: Smith Dover Polarized Sunglasses - Polar Gray Green - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Designed for active adventurers, these fashionable frames wrap your eyes with excellent coverage and protective lens coatings, virtually eliminating distracting glare on either side of the lenses.
